text.doc: The text for which the language should be determined.
The text for which the POS tags should be found.
The text for which the sentiment should be detected.

language.doc: The language of the given text (en=English, de=German).

contextWords.doc: Optionally consider only sentences that contain a context word for the sentiment detection.

text.doc: The text from which dates should be extracted.
The text in which entities should be detected.
The text from which locations should be extracted.
The text of the article (including HTML tags).
